games.title: Dark Souls
games.description: Dark Souls is a series of action role-playing games created by Hidetaka Miyazaki of FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The series began with the release of Dark Souls (2011) and has seen two sequels, Dark Souls II (2014) and Dark Souls III (2016).

healing_item.name: Estus Flask
healing_item.description: A magical flask that refills upon resting at a bonfire. The Estus Flask provides healing to the Undead who drink from it, and is a lifeline for Undead adventurers.

games.title: Elden Ring
games.description: Elden Ring is a new fantasy action RPG developed by FromSoftware Inc. and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was released on February 24, 2022. In this game, players rise as Tarnished and are guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

healing_item.name: Flask of Crimson Tears
healing_item.description: A flask filled with the tears of the Crimson King. Drinking from it restores a portion of the player's health, making it a valuable tool for survival in the Lands Between.

games.title: Demon's Souls
games.description: Demon's Souls is a 2020 action role-playing game developed by Bluepoint Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment for the PlayStation 5. The game was released as a launch title for the PlayStation 5 in November. It is a remake of Demon's Souls, originally developed by FromSoftware for the PlayStation 3 in 2009.

healing_item.name: Moon Grass
healing_item.description: A type of grass that grows in the world of Boletaria. When ingested, it restores the player's health. There are several types of Moon Grass, each with varying degrees of effectiveness.

games.title: Bloodborne
games.description: Bloodborne is an action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. It was released for the PlayStation 4 in March 2015. The game is set in the fictional city of Yharnam, where a mysterious blood-borne illness has ravaged the population.

healing_item.name: Blood Vial
healing_item.description: A vial containing a substance that restores the player's health when consumed. Blood Vials are a precious resource in Yharnam, and can be found scattered throughout the city or purchased from merchants.
